info.name: Burnin' Orange
info.description:
A tribute to TheSpook's original Smokin' Orange deviant art style. Dark shades of gray with radical orange highlights and links. This style is currently WIP and many bits still don't work properly. I'm updating this as I go along and if you find any bugs just let me know ! 

Nov/1/2016 WOW Almost 1k installs !
info.additionalInfo:
I've made some new changes again. Updated the badge and edit profile pages ! Custom buttons coming soon and this theme is still being organized and rewritten. Thank you for downloading my theme as well ! All these downloads are really inspiring me ! I'd also like to thank Thespook for giving me advice on how to edit themes. 

Credits
Inspired and based off the following two themes

Original Theme by LilyB - https://userstyles.org/styles/102172/lilyb-s-deviantart
The version by typhlosion24 - https://userstyles.org/styles/118977/dark-deviantart

Needed Changes

Massive clean up and trimming (If you'd like to clean this code up please let me know)
________________________________________________

Notes/Future Updates

Notes page needs a rehaul
Donation Widget needs to be skinned
<s>Some links are the wrong color</s>
Some bits of text are the wrong color
Custom buttons
Complete Reskin/Rewrite
New Logo ?


Change Log

Nov 2nd, 2016 - Minor Edits made to submission page
Nov 1st, 2016 - Badge Page and Edit Profile pages updated. 1.7 Is now live. 
Jul 3rd, 2016 - Lots of small bits fixed. Version 1.6 now live
Version 1.5 now live
Fixed selected notes tab color - feb 25th 2016
Version 1.0 Released - Feb 24th 2016
